meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cruel.
meanings.sent1: Her cruelty towards animals was unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: The cruelty of the bully made everyone sad.
meanings.sent3: The kitten showed cruelty by stealing the dog's toy.
meanings.sent4: The cruelty of time never stops, always moving forward.
meanings.sent5: The cruelty of the storm left a path of destruction in its wake.

meanings.definition: Behavior that causes pain or suffering to others.
meanings.sent1: His cruelty towards his classmates was hurtful.
meanings.sent2: The cruelty of neglecting the plants led to their withering.
meanings.sent3: The chef's cruelty to the vegetables was to cook them in boiling water.
meanings.sent4: The cruelty of the wind chill made the winter unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The cruelty of the sun's heat made the desert a harsh environment.

meanings.sent1: The cruelty of locking the dog in a cage was heart-wrenching.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't bear the cruelty of the harsh words spoken to her.
meanings.sent3: The cruelty of the prank was revealed when everyone laughed.
meanings.sent4: The cruelty of the paintbrush created a masterpiece on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The cruelty of the dentist's drill made him fear dental visits.
